alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Salt Lake... northwestern Wasatch...south central Morgan and southwestern Summit Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 310 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Snyderville Basin, or near Park City, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Park City, Summit Park, Oakley, North Snyderville Basin, Wanship, South Snyderville Basin, Mill Creek Canyon, Peoa, Kimball Junction, Jordanelle Reservoir, Rockport State Park and Snyderville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 141 and 157. US Route 40 between mile markers 0 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
